description:
Role: Program Event Coordinator

Duration: 12 months


Job Duties and Responsibilities

  • Program Manager for International Events & Advocacy. The program coordinator will be responsible for developing effective programs, overseeing activities and details, and measuring overall success. Their duties will consist of managing various administrative tasks, tracking the budget, and ensuring that the program meets company goals.
  • -White glove event execution for sales calls and visits
  • -Alignment of peer-to-peer sales events for the international region
  • -Project Management for award and speaking engagements for the top customers
  • -Develop collateral and tracking of top customers in the international region
  • -Reporting and planning support
